name: A Dream About a Room With Four Doors
name_original: A Dream About a Room With Four Doors
description:
Ever wanted to be trapped in a recurring nightmare? Sure, we all do! Now here's your chance to plunge into a malevolent DrEaMScApE, and to try to find your way out.
A Dream About a Room With 4 Doors puts you in the pajamas of a tormented soul who can't wake up until overcoming the challenges of their own nightmare. Something in the dream-realm wants to keep the sleeper asleep forever -- but now another force has arrived to help find a way out!

This game will be evolving over time, with new puzzles and challenges in future updates. Your support will help me have the time and resources to continue development. 

CONTROLS:

WSAD - movement

MOUSE - to look around

E - Interact with close highlighted objects (such as doorknobs)

SPACE - jump

ESC - Pause settings

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:

Windows 64-bit

Post 2016 GPU, Windows 7+ for best performance (Windows 10+ for super-best performance).

This game is primarily designed for a resolution of 1920x1080 or 2560x1440. It will attempt to match your resolution, but image and UI will suffer if the resolution is too low.

Be aware there are some flashing lights in this game!

This game was made with Godot 4, an amazing game engine. As I learn more and the engine continues to improve, I will be polishing up and adding to this game accordingly!
